attributes.action: MOD & NHS fund Combat Stress using money intended to support helplines.
attributes.additional_details:
Almost a century, supporting all 3 Service's in every War or Conflict our Government has sent our men and women to without question.
Wed, 07/03/2018            Forces Network.
 £3.2 Million Withdrawn From Combat Stress To Fund NHS 
ps32-million-withdrawn-combat-stress-fund-nhs-veterans-services
25 February 2018            GOV.UK
Defence Secretary shows commitment to Armed Forces mental health with over £220-million funding and new helpline. 
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/defence-secretary-shows-commitment-to-armed-forces-mental-health-with-over-220-million-funding-and-new-helpline
and
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-5458647/Britains-biggest-veterans-mental-health-charity-faces-cash-crisis.html
attributes.background: Since May 1919 Combat Stress have helped former servicemen and women deal with issues like trauma, anxiety, depression and post-traumatic stress disorder almost ever charity has a phone line that direct service & veteran's to Combat Stress seeking help with Mental Heath issues.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/209589
